teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Friends of Mission Belt Co
teams.loan_because: We want to give people a hand up, not a hand out, so that they can become self-sufficient and break the poverty cycle.
teams.description: We support Mission Belt Co and its Mission to fight global hunger by donating proceeds from their awesome no-holes belts
